mapper.update: update tb_business_knowledge set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, knowledge_explain = #{knowledgeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_top = #{isTop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lcd = #{lcd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select knowledge_id, title, domain, knowledge_explain, create_time, user_id, praise_num, is_top, lcd from tb_business_knowledge where knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select knowledge_id, title, domain, knowledge_explain, create_time, user_id, praise_num, is_top, lcd from tb_business_knowledge
